dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: hello. what are we building this time?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: hello builder, i will tell you this. it appears we are creating a belltower. but first i will start with step by step instructions. we will start with green blocks

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: please start with 8 green blocks extending straight up. this will need to be placed as far right as you can, preferably centered along the other axis

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: on the 8th block to the left of the green block, please create the same structure with red blocks

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: it should start on the ground

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: i only meant 8 blocks away from the first green block, to the left

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: good job builder. if you can do this without a supporting structure then please do. we need yet another row of purple blocks that is 9 long so that it lays across the green and red, on top of them

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: starting and ending from the red and green?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: now we must create the bell. please start by extending 4 orange blocks down from the middle purple block, as if it were hanging

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: yes. now we need 3 blocks on both sides of the bottom three blocks so that is looks like a 3x3 square hanging off of the purple row

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: great. now please place 1 orange block on the bottom corners of the 3x3 square so that it is shaped like a bell

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: not quite. they should be on the left and right sides, not the bottom side. my mistake

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: good job builder. we have 1 final piece

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: please place 1 yellow block on the bottom of the bell, in the middle

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: you too builder! you are a master craftsman/woman
